content: this pattern is a free video tutorial on my youtube channel a pdf version is available for purchase on my website- https //www amenagerieofstitches com/collections/patterns/products/crochet-pattern-hoya-heart-succulent-pdf-amigurumi-pattern tired of killing your plants if you re like me and have a hard time keeping plants alive then a crocheted version is perfect for you this hoya heart is not only fun to make but it s also quick make this in under 2 hours and you have the perfect plant that won t die crochet pattern includes step by step photos to help you along as you create your own cactus as well as a full video tutorial crochet pattern difficulty beginner to intermediate pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed worsted weight acrylic yarn size f/3 75mm crochet hook 9mm plastic safety eyes black embroidery floss and embroidery needle polyester fiberfill stitch maker yarn needle scissors cardboard skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease crocheting in back loops only crocheting in front loops only finished size is roughly 5 inches tall and 3 25 inches wide please note- the finished size will vary depending on what type of yarn and size hook you decide to use
